import React from "react"; import pricemark from '../pics/pricemark.png'; import pricemarkWhite from '../pics/pricemarkWhite.png'; function ProductCard({ img, name, href, packing, priceOld, price, onSale = true, measurement = 'кг' }) { return (
{onSale ?
:
}

{name}

{measurement &&

Фасовка: {packing} {measurement}

} {onSale ?
{price} BYN {priceOld} BYN
:
{price} BYN
}
); } export default ProductCard;
